item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, October 17, 2024 at 3:20 AM UTC
item.description:

29. Medical student's apparent celiac disease responded to giardiasis treatment (191 points | 108 comments)
30. FIDO Alliance publishes new spec to let users move passkeys across providers (179 points | 162 comments)
